mapper.select: select m.*, h.name as hierarchy, r.name as role from member m join hierarchy h on m.hierarchy_id = h.id join role r on m.role_id = r.id where m.email = #{email} and e.is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into member (email, password, name, phone, hierarchy_id, address, role_id) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{hierarchyId}, #{address}, #{roleId})
